amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 115-783 to transfer $10,000,000 to the Defense POW/Missing Persons Office to assist in identifying unclaimed remains missing since the Korean conflict.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Allen.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
